sentences.en: Be particularly fastidious about washing your hands before touching food.
sentences.cn: 接触食物前尤其对洗手不能有半点马虎。

sentences.en: He is fastidious about his food.
He moved across the chicken yard with a fastidious, not quite finicking motion.
sentences.cn: 他走过鸡场时,动作里有种过分挑剔的神气, 但还不完全是娇气.

sentences.en: He was at the same time haughty, reserved, and fastidious.
sentences.cn: 他为人兼有傲慢 、 含蓄和爱挑剔的性子.

sentences.en: He was certainly fastidious and critical.
sentences.cn: 他无疑要求很高,很会挑剔.

sentences.en: He was fastidious about his appearance.
He was the picture of fastidious comfort.
sentences.cn: 一眼可以看出,他生活舒适讲究.

sentences.en: He's very sharp, is Sun - fu, and fastidious, too!
sentences.cn: 这位吴老三多么精明, 多么眼高!

sentences.en: Marian's betrothed, this evening, made her feel vaguely fastidious.
sentences.cn: 这天傍晚, 玛丽安的未婚夫搞得她有些腻烦.

sentences.en: Never had Boldwood been so fastidious, unreasonable about the fit, and generally difficult to please.
sentences.cn: 博尔德伍德从来没这样挑剔过, 对式样也从来没这样不通情达理过,总之, 很难使他满意.

sentences.en: people who are fastidious about personal hygiene
sentences.cn: 十分讲究个人卫生的人

sentences.en: She is fastidious in [ about ] her dress.
sentences.cn: 她对于衣服很 挑剔.

sentences.en: She is too fastidious about her food or clothing.
The fact was that I became more and more fastidious as I grew older.
sentences.cn: 事实上,随着年龄的增长,我变得越来越吹毛求疵了.

sentences.en: The lines of his fastidious face showed a vague disquietude.
sentences.cn: 那过分讲究的面孔上的表情是一种隐隐的不安.

sentences.en: You're too fastidious, and too indolent, and too rich.
sentences.cn: 你们从不知足, 而且游手好闲, 钱又太多.

trans.tran_cn: 挑剔的，讲究的，苛求的，（微生物等）需要复杂营养的
trans.tran_en: very careful about small details in your appearance, work etc
